CODIF_DATA.TD_DOCUMENT_TYPE: Prior information notice without call for competition
CODIF_DATA.RP_REGULATION: European Investment Bank, European Investment Fund, European Bank for Reconstruction and Development
CODIF_DATA.HEADING: BR504

ML_TI_DOC.TI_TEXT: EBGU - Genopbygning, større reparationer og teknisk genudrustning af hovedgasledningen Urengoy - Pomary - Uzhgorod
EBWE - Wiederaufbau, Generalüberholung und technische Neuausstattung der Hauptgaspipeline Urengoi-Pomary-Uschhorod
EBRD - Reconstruction, capital repairs and technical re-equipping of the main gas pipeline urengoy – Pomary – Uzhgorod
BERD - Reconstrucción, reparaciones fundamentales y reequipamiento técnico del gasoducto principal de Urengoy-Pomary-Uzhgorod
EBRD - Urengoin, Pomaryn ja Užhorodin välisen pääkaasuputken uudelleenrakentaminen, laaja korjaaminen ja tekninen uudelleenvarustelu
BERD - Reconstruction, réparations majeures et rééquipement technique du gazoduc principal Urengoy-Pomary-Uzhgorod
ΕΤΑΑ - Ανακατασκευή, γενικές επισκευές και τεχνικός επανεξοπλισμός για τον κύριο αγωγό αερίου Urengoy – Pomary – Uzhgorod
BERS - Ricostruzione, principali riparazioni e riallestimento tecnico del gasdotto principale Urengoy–Pomary–Uzhgorod
EBWO - Project voor het heraanleggen, uitvoerig repareren en technisch opnieuw uitrusten van de hoofdgaspijpleiding tussen Urengoy, Pomary en Uzhgorod
BERD - Reconstrução, principais reparações e reequipamento técnico do principal gasoduto Urengoy-Pomary-Uzhgorod
EBRD - Återuppbyggnad, större reparationer och teknisk återutrustning av huvudgasledningen Urengoj–Pomary–Uzjhorod
EBOR - Obnova, generální oprava a technická modernizace hlavního plynovodu Urengoy – Pomary – Užhorod
EBRD - Urengoi-Pomarõ-Užgorodi peagaasijuhtme ümberehitamine, kapitaalremont ja uute tehniliste seadmetega varustamine
EBRD - Az Urengoj-Pomari-Ungvár főgázvezeték helyreállítása, nagyjavítása és műszaki berendezéseinek cseréje
ERPB - Pagrindinio dujų vamzdyno Urengojus–Pomary–Užhorodas rekonstrukcija, kapitalinis remontas ir techninis įrangos pakeitimas
ERAB - galvenā gāzes cauruļvada posmā Urengoja–Pomary–Užhoroda rekonstrukcija, kapitālais remonts un atkārtota tehniskā aprīkošana
BERŻ - Kostruzzjoni mill-ġdid, Tiswijiet Kapitali u Tgħammir Tekniku mill-Ġdid tal-Pajplajn Ewlieni tal-Gass Urengoy – Pomary – Uzhgorod
EBOR - Przebudowa, remont kapitalny oraz ponowne wyposażenie techniczne magistrali gazociągu Urengoj – Pomary – Użhorod
EBOR - Rekonštrukcia, väčšie opravy a technická výmena hlavného plynovodu Urengoy – Pomary – Užhorod
EBOR - Obnova, glavna popravila in ponovno tehnično opremljanje glavnega plinovoda Urengoy–Pomary–Uzhgorod
EBRD - Atógáil, Deisiúcháin Caipitil agus Atrealmhú Teicniúil ar Phríomh-phíblíne Gháis Urengoy – Pomary – Uzhgorod
ЕБВР - Реконструкция, основни ремонти и техническо преоборудване на основните газопроводи Уренгой – Помари – Ужгород
BERD - Reconstrucţie, reparaţii capitale şi reechipare tehnică a conductei principale de gaze Urengoy – Pomary – Ujhorod
EBRD - Rekonstrukcija, temeljni popravci i ponovno tehničko opremanje glavnog plinovoda Urengoj – Pomari – Užgorod

TI_DOC.P: EBGU - Genopbygning, større reparationer og teknisk genudrustning af hovedgasledningen Urengoy - Pomary - Uzhgorod (UA-Kyiv)

CONTENTS.P: Project name: Reconstruction, capital repairs and technical re-equipping of the main gas pipeline urengoy – Pomary – Uzhgorod
Country: Ukraine
Business sector: Energy
Project ID: 42608
Funding source EBRD, EIB
Type of contract: Goods, works and services
Type of notice: General Procurement Notice
Issue date: 16.2.2018
Closing date: 16.2.2019 at 23:59 local
This general procurement notice updates the original general procurement notice for this project, which was published on the EBRD’s web site on 4.7.2016.

Public joint stock company “UKRTRANSGAZ” intends using the proceeds of a loan from the European Bank for Reconstruction and Development, European Investment Bank (the Banks) for the implementation of the emergency project, which forms part of the reconstruction, capital repairs and technical re-equipping of the main gas pipeline Urengoy – Pomary – Uzhgorod. The proposed project, which has a total estimated cost of up to EUR 300 million, is require the procurement of the following goods, works and services:
— equipment and supplies (pipes, induction bends, fittings, valves) for Bar-Gusiatyn and Gusiatyn-Bogorodchany sections of the Urengoy-Pomary-Uzhgorod main gas pipeline,
— equipment and supplies (pipes, induction bends, fittings, valves) for Romny-Grebinky and Grebinky-Soviivka sections of the Urengoy-Pomary-Uzhgorod main gas pipeline,
— reconstruction of Compressor Station Romny including, inter alia, replacement of two compressors units,
— consultancy services for lenders’ monitoring consultant.
Tendering for the above contracts is expected to begin in the second quarter of 2018.

Contracts to be financed with the proceeds of a loan from the Banks will be subject to the European Bank for Reconstruction and Development Procurement Policies and Rules and will be open to firms from any country. The proceeds of the Bank's loan will not be used for the purpose of any payment to persons or entities, of for any import of goods, if such payment or import is prohibited by a decision of the United Nations Security Council taken under Chapter VII of the Charter of the United Nations or under a law of official regulation of the purchaser's country.
Interested suppliers, contractors and consultants should contact:

TI_DOC.P: EBWE - Wiederaufbau, Generalüberholung und technische Neuausstattung der Hauptgaspipeline Urengoi-Pomary-Uschhorod (UA-Kyiv)

Closing date: 16.2.2019 at 23:59 local
This general procurement notice updates the original general procurement notice for this project, which was published on the EBRD’s web site on 4.7.2016.

Public joint stock company “UKRTRANSGAZ” intends using the proceeds of a loan from the European Bank for Reconstruction and Development, European Investment Bank (the Banks) for the implementation of the emergency project, which forms part of the reconstruction, capital repairs and technical re-equipping of the main gas pipeline Urengoy – Pomary – Uzhgorod. The proposed project, which has a total estimated cost of up to EUR 300 million, is require the procurement of the following goods, works and services:
— equipment and supplies (pipes, induction bends, fittings, valves) for Bar-Gusiatyn and Gusiatyn-Bogorodchany sections of the Urengoy-Pomary-Uzhgorod main gas pipeline,
— equipment and supplies (pipes, induction bends, fittings, valves) for Romny-Grebinky and Grebinky-Soviivka sections of the Urengoy-Pomary-Uzhgorod main gas pipeline,
— reconstruction of Compressor Station Romny including, inter alia, replacement of two compressors units,
— consultancy services for lenders’ monitoring consultant.
Tendering for the above contracts is expected to begin in the second quarter of 2018.

Contracts to be financed with the proceeds of a loan from the Banks will be subject to the European Bank for Reconstruction and Development Procurement Policies and Rules and will be open to firms from any country. The proceeds of the Bank's loan will not be used for the purpose of any payment to persons or entities, of for any import of goods, if such payment or import is prohibited by a decision of the United Nations Security Council taken under Chapter VII of the Charter of the United Nations or under a law of official regulation of the purchaser's country.
Interested suppliers, contractors and consultants should contact:

TI_DOC.P: EBRD - Urengoi-Pomarõ-Užgorodi peagaasijuhtme ümberehitamine, kapitaalremont ja uute tehniliste seadmetega varustamine (UA-Kyiv)
